Pariññā Sutta：1．Pariññā SuttaThe five khandhas are things to be understood （pariññeyyā dhammā）．S．iii．26．

2．Pariññā SuttaThe teaching for the comprehension of all attachment：from eye and object arises eye consciousness，the union of these is contact； from contact comes feeling； similarly with regard to the other senses．S．iv．32f．

3．Pariññā （or Addhāna） SuttaThe five indriyas，if developed，conduce to comprehension of the way out．S．v．236．

Pariññāya SuttaBy fully understanding body，feeling，etc．，deathlessness is realized．S．v．182．
